CS:GO is definitely the best game ever because it stayed in the market for so many years and still is the most competitive game for my opinion. The CS:GO players are since the begining when they started with counter strike and untill this day they never left playing CS. I personally play this game since 2004 and from that time i never quit playing this beautiful strategy game who helps you relax after work and helps you with your cognitive skills. I have just one thing to say to the creators of this game, you made history with this game.

Will love and respect,
Belot Hoti,

Republic of Kosovo
